element.definition: A unique identifier for a dependent under the coverage.
element.requirements: For some coverage a single identifier is issued to the PolicyHolder and dependent number issues to each to each of their dependents to track and manage the plan.

mapping.map: - No exact HL7 v2 equivalent concept seems to exist; instance relationship can be inferred if ( ( PID-3 ??? IN1-49 ) & ( ?? IN2-72 ) )
